entries.journal_entry_description: Raine Taske is refining his crafting skill. Now, show him how to make food.
entries.journal_entry_title: Sharing the Art of Crafting: Food
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use your Generic Crafting Tool to make Bofa Treats. Bofa Treats are made with organics and cereal.  To use the crafting tool: Double-click on the generic crafting tool in your inventory. Double-click on the schematic that you wish to use.  Double-click on the appropriate resources. Only resources that you can use will be available. Once you decide what resources to use, press the Assemble button. Press Yes to confirm that you want to make the item. If you cancel after this point, you lose the resources. You will see how successful the item is. Press Next to continue. Press Create Object to complete the item.  Press Yes to confirm. The item will be complete in a few seconds.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You made Bofa Treats. Show Raine what you created.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Talk to Raine in Hangar Bay 1
